name: Oven Bacon

instructions.ja: オーブンを375-400°F（190-200°C）に予熱します。

instructions.en: Line a rimmed baking sheet with heavy foil.
instructions.sk: Vyložte plech na pečenie s okrajmi ťažkou fóliou.
instructions.ja: 縁のあるベーキングシートに厚手のアルミホイルを敷きます。

instructions.en: Arrange bacon slices in a single layer side by side on the foil.
instructions.sk: Rozložte plátky slaniny v jednej vrstve vedľa seba na fóliu.
instructions.ja: ベーコンスライスをアルミホイルの上に一列に並べます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15-20 minutes, rotating the pan every 5 minutes. Watch closely after 10 minutes to prevent burning.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15-20 minút, každých 5 minút otočte plech. Po 10 minútach pozorne sledujte, aby sa nespálila.
instructions.ja: 15-20分焼き、5分ごとに天板を回転させます。10分経過後は焦げないよう注意深く見守ります。

notes: A 12-ounce package fits on a 17x12" pan. Thick bacon may take longer to cook. No need to flip the bacon. The bacon cooks in its own fat, resulting in a deep-fried texture. Clean-up is easy with the foil lining.
